languages.text: "Рад слышать, что вы пересмотрели свои взгляды и осознали ошибки. Это не уменьшает долг, в котором вы находитесь перед Инквизицией, но внушает надежду, что долг этот закроете вы, а не ваш наследник".

"I am pleased that you have reconsidered and acknowledged your error. It does not reduce the debt you owe to the Inquisition, but it offers hope that this debt will be discharged by you, and not your heir."
languages.original_text: "Рад слышать, что вы пересмотрели свои взгляды и осознали ошибки. Это не уменьшает долг, в котором вы находитесь перед Инквизицией, но внушает надежду, что долг этот закроете вы, а не ваш наследник".

traits.locale_text: "I am pleased that you have reconsidered and acknowledged your error. It does not reduce the debt you owe to the Inquisition, but it offers hope that this debt will be discharged by you, and not your heir."

"I am pleased that you have reconsidered and acknowledged your error. It does not reduce the debt you owe to the Inquisition, but it offers hope that this debt will be discharged by you, and not your heir."

"I am pleased that you have reconsidered and acknowledged your error. It does not reduce the debt you owe to the Inquisition, but it offers hope that this debt will be discharged by you, and not your heir."

"I am pleased that you have reconsidered and acknowledged your error. It does not reduce the debt you owe to the Inquisition, but it offers hope that this debt will be discharged by you, and not your heir."

languages.text: “我很高兴你重新考虑自己的行为，并承认了你的错误。尽管这并不会减少你欠审判庭的债务，但这让我们看到了希望，让我们相信这笔债务将会由你来偿清，而不是落在你的继承人头上。”
languages.original_text: "I am pleased that you have reconsidered and acknowledged your error. It does not reduce the debt you owe to the Inquisition, but it offers hope that this debt will be discharged by you, and not your heir."

traits.locale_text: “我很高兴你重新考虑自己的行为，并承认了你的错误。尽管这并不会减少你欠审判庭的债务，但这让我们看到了希望，让我们相信这笔债务将会由你来偿清，而不是落在你的继承人头上。”

languages.text: «Me alegro de ver que ha recapacitado y reconoce su error. Si bien no reduce su deuda con la Inquisición, por lo menos me permite albergar esperanzas de que sea usted quien repare la deuda y no su sucesor».
languages.original_text: "I am pleased that you have reconsidered and acknowledged your error. It does not reduce the debt you owe to the Inquisition, but it offers hope that this debt will be discharged by you, and not your heir."

traits.locale_text: «Me alegro de ver que ha recapacitado y reconoce su error. Si bien no reduce su deuda con la Inquisición, por lo menos me permite albergar esperanzas de que sea usted quien repare la deuda y no su sucesor».

languages.text: 「己の過ちを再考して認めたことは認めてやろう。異端審問庁への借りが減るわけではないが、この借りはお前自身が精算し、次代に引き継がれることはないという希望が残る」
languages.original_text: "I am pleased that you have reconsidered and acknowledged your error. It does not reduce the debt you owe to the Inquisition, but it offers hope that this debt will be discharged by you, and not your heir."

traits.locale_text: 「己の過ちを再考して認めたことは認めてやろう。異端審問庁への借りが減るわけではないが、この借りはお前自身が精算し、次代に引き継がれることはないという希望が残る」

languages.original_text: "I am pleased that you have reconsidered and acknowledged your error. It does not reduce the debt you owe to the Inquisition, but it offers hope that this debt will be discharged by you, and not your heir."

languages.text: "Es freut mich, dass Ihr nachgedacht habt und Euren Fehler einseht. Das reduziert nicht Eure Schuld gegenüber der Inquisition, aber es macht Hoffnung, dass diese Schuld von Euch beglichen wird und nicht von Eurem Erben."
languages.original_text: "I am pleased that you have reconsidered and acknowledged your error. It does not reduce the debt you owe to the Inquisition, but it offers hope that this debt will be discharged by you, and not your heir."

traits.locale_text: "Es freut mich, dass Ihr nachgedacht habt und Euren Fehler einseht. Das reduziert nicht Eure Schuld gegenüber der Inquisition, aber es macht Hoffnung, dass diese Schuld von Euch beglichen wird und nicht von Eurem Erben."

languages.text: « Je me réjouis de voir que vous reconnaissez votre erreur. Bien que cela ne réduise en rien la dette que vous avez contractée envers l'Inquisition, j'en tire au moins l'espoir que vous vous chargerez de la rembourser vous-même, plutôt que de la transmettre à vos éventuels héritiers. »
languages.original_text: "I am pleased that you have reconsidered and acknowledged your error. It does not reduce the debt you owe to the Inquisition, but it offers hope that this debt will be discharged by you, and not your heir."

traits.locale_text: « Je me réjouis de voir que vous reconnaissez votre erreur. Bien que cela ne réduise en rien la dette que vous avez contractée envers l'Inquisition, j'en tire au moins l'espoir que vous vous chargerez de la rembourser vous-même, plutôt que de la transmettre à vos éventuels héritiers. »

languages.text: "Konuyu tekrar değerlendirmenden ve hatanı kabullenmenden memnunum. Belki Engizisyon'a olan borcunu azaltmayacak ama bu borcun, vârisine kalmadan senden tahsil edilebileceğine dair ümit veriyor."
languages.original_text: "I am pleased that you have reconsidered and acknowledged your error. It does not reduce the debt you owe to the Inquisition, but it offers hope that this debt will be discharged by you, and not your heir."

traits.locale_text: "Konuyu tekrar değerlendirmenden ve hatanı kabullenmenden memnunum. Engizisyon'a olan borcunu azaltmayacak belki ama bu borcun vârisinden değil de senden tahsil edileceğine dair bir umut ortaya çıkarıyor."
